The Atlanta Braves and Cincinnati Reds are making history! On August 2, 2025, they’ll face off at Bristol Motor Speedway in the first-ever American or National League game in Tennessee. Don’t miss this epic showdown at The Last Great Colosseum. Be part of history—get your tickets now! Tim McGraw to Headline Pregame Concert at Historic MLB Matchup in Tennessee, with Pitbull & Additional Special Guests to Be Announced Tim McGraw will take the stage in a setting as legendary as the music itself. Available to All Fans Every ticket to the MLB Speedway Classic presented by BuildSubmarines.com includes access to the concert—enjoy it from your seat and on the iconic Colossus video board. Premium Ticket Opportunity A limited number of premium tickets are being released at 10 a.m. ET on Wednesday, April 23 , giving Tim’s biggest fans the chance to experience the show closer to the stage! Fans in sections 101-109 and 301-305 (closest to the baseball field) will have floor access to the area in front of and adjacent to the stage. Fans with tickets in other sections who want to get closer to the performance will have the opportunity to purchase an add-on pass to view the concert from a special additional viewing zone for Tim’s performance prior to the game. Stay Tuned! More exciting announcements coming soon—including special guest artists joining Tim on stage. Helpful Ticketing Information TICKET QUANTITY: There is a ticket limit of eight (8) tickets per order and customer. ONLINE ONLY: All sales must be conducted online. There will be no phone or window sales taken through the Bristol Motor Speedway Ticket Office or the Reds and Braves Ticket Offices. SEAT SELECTION: You will be selecting your actual seats for the game from an interactive seat map . For your reference, please see artistic representation from a select number of locations across the venue. PLEASE NOTE: Given the size of the venue and amount of data within the map, it may take additional time to load when attempting to purchase from a mobile device. TICKET PRICING: Ticket prices for the MLB Speedway Classic start at just $50 (plus sales tax & fees). Please note that ticket prices may fluctuate based on demand in certain areas (dynamic pricing is common for MLB games). There will be a limited amount of Premium Seating available for the sale – including a very limited number of tickets in the temporary seating area (sections 101-109, 301-305) that will be built behind home plate. Additional premium options and grandstand seating will be released at a later date. If you are interested in a private suite for the game, please reach out with your information and a representative will contact you regarding your interest and availability. TICKET DELIVERY: All tickets for the Speedway Classic will be delivered digitally and available on your mobile device through the MLB Ballpark app and the Ticketmaster app. Delivery of event tickets will be delayed until 2025 (i.e. you will not see your tickets immediately available for download). PARKING: Bristol Motor Speedway has a limited number of parking spaces available to purchase in advance. If spaces are available at the time of your purchase, you will be able to purchase a parking pass along with your tickets when you buy online at Ticketmaster.com. If more parking becomes available at a later date, BMS will notify ticket holders that new inventory is available for online purchase. See map above. If you are unable to pre-purchase parking via through BMS, many of the neighboring properties around the BMS offer day-of-event parking (pay upon entry). Map of neighboring properties » TRAVEL: Those planning to travel to the MLB Speedway Classic from out of town will have a variety of accommodation and flight options throughout the Tri-Cities area (Bristol, Johnson City, Kingsport – all within 30 minutes drive) and greater region (Knoxville, TN and Asheville, NC are both less than 2 hours by car). Airports within closest driving distance include Tri-Cities (TRI), Knoxville (TYS), and Asheville (AVL). CAMPING: Campsites on BMS property will also be available to purchase online. Unlike parking, camping will be purchased separately. Speedway Classic ticket buyers will be emailed a link to purchase camping, typically within 24 hours of your ticket purchase. If you have any questions regarding your ticket purchase, please contact the ticket help desk at speedwayclassictickethelp@mlb.com during business hours (Mon – Fri, 9 a.m. – 5 p.m. ET).
